Title: Rank and File
Description:
First things first; let's kill us some crusaders.

And when I say kill the Scarlet Crusade, I mean wipe them out, root and branch, rank and file.
ObjectivesText: Kill 50 members of the Scarlet Crusade within the Scarlet Halls.
CompletionText:
You know, I've been killing the ones that you can't see behind closed doors.

But I need to maintain this disguise. So if you could just take care of all of the ones out there in the open, that'd be great.
RewardText:
Great start, $p!

It won't be long now before the Scarlet Crusade is nothing more than an ugly footnote in the annals of history.
